delete.title: Remove Supplier
delete.subtitle:
Are you sure you want to remove this supplier? All information related to this supplier will be lost forever.

All equipment and loans associated with this supplier will be lost.

This action cannot be undone.

delete.title: Remove Employee
delete.subtitle:
Are you sure you want to remove this employee? All information related to this employee will be lost forever.

All loans associated with this employee will be lost.

This action cannot be undone.

delete.title: Remove Equipment
delete.subtitle:
Are you sure you want to remove this equipment? All information related to this equipment will be lost forever.

All loans associated with this equipment will be lost.

This action cannot be undone.

delete.title: Remove Loan
delete.subtitle:
Are you sure you want to remove this loan? All information related to this loan will be lost forever.

This action cannot be undone.
